metadata.title: CVE-2022-46873 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Because Firefox did not implement the unsafe-hashes CSPdirective, an attacker who was able to inject markup into a page otherwiseprotected by a Content Security Policy may have been able to injectexecutable script. This would be severely constrained by the specifiedContent Security Policy of the document. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 108.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
